text: keferi‘onimi betesebochi anidi iminetuni yemidebik’i mi’imeni sewi ale፡- «sewiyewini kegetachihu bete‘amiratochi be’irigit’i yemet’alechihu sihoni ‹getaye alahi newi› silemili tigedilalachihuni? wishetamimi bihoni wishetu berisuwi layi newi፡፡ iwinetenya bihoni gini yeziya yemiyaseferarachihu kefilu yagenyachihwali፡፡ alahi yanini irisu diniberi alafi wishetami yehonewini ayimeramina፡፡
